title: Hacks?
body: I cannot connect to the game, it keeps saying that my internet has connection issues which is in fact not, is this something like hacks? Will I lose any IP for this?

replies.body: There are cheats to disco you from a match yes. Was it one only riot would know if you report it.

Even though you may be able to use the net without issue, you can still have problems specifically connecting to the game server.  Your best bet would be to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, and maintain a stable connection in-game.  Let me know if you have any questions.
